ctx: intros P Q x y H H0.

original: intros P Q x y H H0. unfold locally_2d in *. unfold locally in *. intros H1. specialize (H x y). destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros u v H2 H3. apply H0. exists delta. intros u' v' H4 H5. apply H1. exists delta. intros u'' v'' H6 H7. apply H2. apply H. apply H4.
